TieredSelectProps.name: i18nScope
TieredSelectProps.description: The i18n key to use for the tiered select's configurable strings. Defaults to using the core library's default strings.

TieredSelectProps.name: loadingMore
TieredSelectProps.description: Used to display a loading indicator as the last item of the list. Can be used with onScrollBottom or onSearch{' '} (empty options during search async call) to indicate the loading of new items.

TieredSelectProps.name: options
TieredSelectProps.description: Flat array of tier objects, this array is used as data for the component

TieredSelectProps.name: selectableTiers
TieredSelectProps.description: If true, any tier is selectable. If false, only leaf nodes are selectable

TieredSelectProps.name: value
TieredSelectProps.description: Flat array of tier objects that represents the selected value

TieredSelectProps.name: getGroupId
TieredSelectProps.description: Callback for using a custom tier shape {'(tier: any) => Id'} Defaults to {'(tier: any) => tier.GroupId'}

TieredSelectProps.name: getId
TieredSelectProps.description: Callback for using a custom tier shape {'(tier: any) => Id'} Defaults to {'(tier: any) => tier.Id'}

TieredSelectProps.name: getLabel
TieredSelectProps.description: Callback for using a custom tier shape {'(tier: any) => string'} Defaults to {'(tier: any) => tier.Label'}

TieredSelectProps.name: getNextGroupId
TieredSelectProps.description: Callback for using a custom tier shape {'(tier: any) => Id'} Defaults to {'(tier: any) => tier.NextGroupId'}

TieredSelectProps.name: onChange
TieredSelectProps.description:
Callback for selecting an item from the tiered select. Returns the{' '} Selection object from the Menu api, along with the updated value
{'(Selection: { event, item, group }, value) =>'}

TieredSelectProps.name: onNavigate
TieredSelectProps.description:
Callback for when navigation occurs. Triggered by the left and right
arrow keys, or clicking a navigable item. Returns the id of the next
group that will be navigated to, and the updated path.
<CodeBlock>
 {'(nextGroupId: string | number | undefined, path: any[]) => '}
</CodeBlock>

TieredSelectProps.name: onQuickCreate
TieredSelectProps.description:
Pass this callback when a quick create experience is desired. Called
when the "create" button in quick create mode is clicked. Returns the
value of the quick create input.
<CodeBlock>{'(string) =>'}</CodeBlock>
